snippet: Bernard H. Goetz, who became notorious as the subway rider who shot four teenagers, was charged with trying to sell marijuana to an undercover police officer.
abstract: Bernard H Goetz, who became notorious in 1980s as white New York City subway rider who shot four black teenagers, is charged with trying to sell marijuana to undercover police officer in Union Square.
lead_paragraph: Bernard H. Goetz, who became notorious as the subway rider who shot four teenagers, was charged with trying to sell marijuana to an undercover police officer.

headline.main: Bernard Goetz, Man in ’84 Subway Shooting, Faces Marijuana Charges
headline.print_headline: Man in ’84 Subway Shooting Faces Marijuana Charges
